item.title: The Movie Mingle #152 – The Ipcress File (1965) – {PODCAST}
item.description: Movie Mingler proudly presents: ‘The Movie Mingle’ #152 This week: Nick takes a look at the spy classic, The Ipcress File, the 1965 spy classic; Staring Michael Cain, Directed by Sidney J. Furie, and Produced by Harry Saltzman. Also discussed: Broadcast News (1987). Stolen Kisses (1968). Nosferatu the Vampyre (1979) AND much much MUCH more… […] Feed: https://moviemingler.com/category/podcast/feed/

item.title: My Father, My Fighter: A Story of Love, Loss, and Letting Go
item.description:
In this deeply personal episode of Pillowtalkpodcast, I open up about the recent passing of my father. From the warmth of our kitchen lessons to the hard truths about addiction, this episode is a reflection on the love, pain, and complexity that comes with grieving a parent.

My father battled heroin addiction, and in the end, it was his health — both mental and physical — that took him... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/1c1586c/podcast/rss
